name: Gimmighoul (Roaming)

conditions.value: when this Pokémon has collected 999 gimmighoul coins (chest form starts with 50+1d100, roaming form starts with 1d20)

description: The Coin Hunter Pokémon. This Pokémon was born from passion that seeped into a coin. It wanders, apparently seeking to return to the treasure chest it once inhabited.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.
